item.title: About
item.description: Explore and Explain Hi, I'm Jason West and I have been seriously studying the Bible for a couple of decades. I have an insatiable curiosity. In fact, it's almost an obsessive compulsion to mentally explore all sorts of seemingly unrelated subjects and fit all of the knowledge I discover into one unifiedÂ system, or one big picture of reality. I sometimes get lost in my own little world of theoretical possibilities, seeing everything in terms of how it could be improved, or what it could be turned into.
